name: Geometric Forest- Christmas Gift Tag
description: A "forest" of uniquely colored trees are featured on this gift tag. The tag is embellished with a black eyelet and includes red and white striped string. Details Size- 2 x 3.5 Quantity- pack of 8 gift tags String- red and white stripes

name: Snowflakes- Christmas Gift Tag
description: What would Christmas be without snow? Our snowflakes gift tag features falling snow on a bold background and hand lettering. The tag is embellished with a black eyelet and includes string. Details Size- 2 x 3.5 Quantity- pack of 8 gift tags String- Red and White striped string accompanies the black, red and jade design. Gold string accompanies the gold and pink design. Please choose your color choice from the drop box below

name: Elegance- Christmas Gift Tag
description: A mixture of hand lettering and a clean font create an elegant gift tag that is embellished with a black eyelet and gold string. The tag reads "Seasons Greetings" and also has tan and black stripes to its left. Details Size- 2 x 3.5 Quantity- pack of 8 gift tags String- gold string

name: Geometric Tree- Christmas Gift Tag
description: Our Geometric Tree Christmas card is also available as a gift tag. The tag is embellished with a black eyelet and string is included. Details Size- 2 x 3.5 Quantity- pack of 8 gift tags String- Red and White striped string accompanies the red, green and white design. Gold string accompanies the green and pink design. Please select your color choice from the drop box below

name: Stack O' Gifts- Christmas Gift Tag
description: Gifts on a gift! Our Stack O' Gifts Christmas card is also available as a gift tag. The tag is embellished with a black eyelet and string is included. Details Size- 2 x 3.5 Quantity- pack of 8 gift tags String- Red and White striped string accompanies the red and green design. Gold string accompanies the black, gold and red design. Please select your color choice from the drop box below

name: "Holiday Martini" Christmas Cards
description: Candy Cane Garnish The outside of this card shows a martini glass with a candy cane garnish and reads, "Spreading a little Holiday Cheer...". The inside reads, "...to brighten up your Christmas and ring in the New Year. Merry Christmas" Holly Garnish The outside of this card shows a martini glass illustration with a garnish of holly and reads, "A Toast to you and yours". The inside reads, "Wishing you peace and blessings this holiday and for years to come. Happy Holidays" Details Size 4.25 x 5.5 Envelope- Red Euro-Flap with gold glitter liner Quantity- pack of 10 greeting cards Please choose your card design from the drop box below.

name: Stack O' Gifts Christmas Cards
description: This colorful card is designed with digital illustrations of wrapped Christmas gifts on the outside while the inside reads "The gift of love. The gift of peace. The gift of happiness. May all these be yours at Christmas." There are two festive color options, either gold, black and red or red and green. Details Size- 4.25 x 5.5 Envelope- Red Euro-Flap with gold glitter liner Quantity- pack of 10 greeting cards Please choose your color option from the drop box below

name: "Goodness + Light" Christmas Cards
description: An elegant yet fun way to spread the holiday cheer! The front of this card reads "Goodness + Light" and shows an illustration of Christmas lights with strands that are hand drawn with gold leaf. The inside of the card reads "Be a vessel of love and joy this holiday season" The cards are accompanied by white euro-flap envelopes. Details Size 5.5 x 4.25 Envelope- White Euro-Flap Quantity- pack of 10 greeting cards Please note, due to the hand-crafted elements on this card, there may be slight variances

name: Geometric Tree Christmas Cards
description: For the geometry lover, this card is mostly designed using angles (except for the lovely handwritten word "joy" and the circular tree topper). The inside reads "May the peace and joy of Christmas be with you today and throughout the New Year." There are two festive color options, either green and pink or red, green and white. Details Size- 4.25 x 5.5 Envelope- Red Euro-Flap with gold glitter liner Quantity- pack of 10 greeting cards Please choose your color option from the drop box below

name: "Merry and Bike" Christmas Cards
description: For the biking enthusiast, this fun card shows a bike illustration decorated with Christmas lights. The inside reads, "May your days be Merry and Bike" Details Size 5.5 x 4.25 Envelope- Red Euro-Flap with gold glitter liner Quantity- pack of 10 greeting cards

name: Glitter Flake Christmas Cards
description: If you love glitter you will love this card! Our glitter flake card features geometric icicles with a single snowflake that is hand glittered. The outside of this card reads "Merry Christmas" and the interior is blank for your own sentiments. There are two festive color options, either Gold and Grey or Blue and Pink. Details Size- 4.25 x 5.5 Envelope- White Euro-Flap with gold glitter liner Quantity- pack of 10 greeting cards Please note, due to the hand-crafted elements on this card, there may be slight variances Please choose your color option from the drop box below

name: Christmas Card Singles
description: All of our Holiday cards can be ordered individually as well. Just choose the card(s) that you want from the drop down box below. Details One card with accompanying euro-flap envelope (red or white depending on the card choice) Size- 4.25 x 5.5

name: "Text Happy" 5x7 Christmas Photo Card (Eco-Friendly)
description: This Christmas photo card shows your holiday salutation in a large, chunky and modern font. Non-traditional color options add a fun twist! We consider this Eco-friendly because you are only paying for the design (no shipping required)! We will email you a high resolution jpeg of your card and you can submit the file to the printing facility of your choice! The card size is 5x7. Your customizable options -Holiday message -Holiday Salutation -Signature - b+w or color photograph (we can change a color photo to b+w for you) You will receive the web link to our order details form after we receive notification of your order. On this form you will fill out all of the information that you want on your card. Submit the completed form along with your high resolution (300 dpi) unaltered photo and you will receive your card within 72 hours! Please choose your color option from the drop box below © Color Hug. All rights reserved.

We consider this Eco-friendly because you are only paying for the design (no shipping required)! We will email you a high resolution jpeg of your card and you can submit the file to the printing facility of your choice or even print on your home printer! The card size is 5x7. name: Birthday-tini Greeting Card
description: The outside of this fun greeting card shows a martini glass illustration with a birthday candle "stir stick". The inside reads "Cake is for kids. Cheers to another year!" There are two candle color options, pink or blue. The pink candle comes with a pink envelope and the blue candle comes with a turquoise envelope. Please select the color candle that you would like from the drop down box below Measurements: Card- 4.25 x 5.5 Envelope- 4.375 x 5.75 © Color Hug. All rights reserved.

name: "Hello" Calling Cards
description: A universal greeting that everyone across the globe will know, "Hello!" This business/calling card shows the word "Hello" on one side, and your contact information is designated for the other. Your choice of two colors (listed in images) and up to 5 lines of text/contact info. Specs- 100 cards 3.5" x 2" Printed with Soy based ink 12pt gloss card stock is 10% PCW recycled content and acid-free The fonts shown for this card are the only fonts available for this design. You will receive an emailed proof within 48 hours after payment has been received. Please indicate the two colors that you would like in the "Add special instructions for merchant" link of the PayPal checkout page as well as the information that you want displayed on the card. © Color Hug. All rights reserved.

name: "Triangles" Birthday Greeting Card
description: The outside of this colorful greeting card shows a triangular patterned background accompanied by the phrase "Happy Birthday". The inside is blank for your own thoughts. There are two color scheme options, orange/pink or black/blue. Both come with a white envelope. Please select the color scheme that you would like from the drop down box below Measurements: Card- 4.25 x 5.5 White envelope- 4.375 x 5.75

name: "This is a Test" Art Print
description: Life is full of many tests, and it can be hard to remember that when a tough situation is at hand. Hang this inspirational print on your wall as a reminder that "This is a test, this is only a test". An 8x10 print on 8.5x11 matte paper. (frame not included) There are 30 colors to choose from. You have the option of a solid colored background with white text or colored text with a white background. Please select the option that you would prefer from the drop down box below. Please indicate the color that you would like in the "Add special instructions for merchant" link of the PayPal checkout page © Color Hug. All rights reserved.

White background with solid colored text

name: "Love.That's All." Art Print
description: It's simple...the answer to many questions in life is Love. That's all. This inspirational print is a reminder that acting out of love can make the world a happier place. An 8x10 print on 8.5x11 matte paper. (frame not included) Please select your color combination from the box below © Color Hug. All rights reserved.

name: "Vintage Nail Polish Bottles" Art Print
description: For the lover of nail polish! Hang this print of vintage nail polish bottle illustrations in your dressing room, powder room, or any other room that you would like to add a pop of color. An 8x10 print on 8.5x11 matte paper. (frame not included) This print comes in four different color combinations. Please select your color combination from the box below © Color Hug. All rights reserved.

name: "It's okay" Art Print
description: You're original. You're kooky. You're a trendsetter. You're a leader. You don't care what others say about you. This inspirational/motivational print is for you. It's okay to color outside of the lines...who cares what they say? An 8x10 print on 8.5x11 matte paper. (frame not included) Please select your color combination from the box below © Color Hug. All rights reserved.

name: "Seasons" Art Prints- Set of four
description:
This set of four prints is representative of winter (blue), spring (pink), summer (green) and autumn (orange).  Hang in an entryway, living room, dining room...wherever you want to add a dash of color in your home or office!

Specs:

Four 8x10 illustrations printed on 8.5x11 matte paper.  Frames and matting not included.
